co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.module

Annotation Type DatasetType


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
@Beta
public @interface DatasetType
    Annotation to declare a dataset type from Dataset. The value is used as dataset type name. This is used when creating DatasetDefinition from only Dataset implementation. See co.cask.cdap.api.app.ApplicationConfigurer#addDatasetType(Class <? extends Dataset> datasetClass) for details. Example of usage: 
     
 @DatasetType("KVTable")
 public class SimpleKVTable extends AbstractDataset {
   public SimpleKVTable(DatasetSpecification spec, @EmbeddedDataset("data") Table table) {
     super(spec.getTransactionAwareName(), table);
   }

   //...
 }

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String value
      Returns name of the dataset type.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Returns name of the dataset type.
